participant_1.background:
I take my dog on hiking trips up volcanoes, and he loves the challenge!
i look down on people who did not.
I'm a klutz, but I'm still proud of my comic book collection.
i have never done drugs because i do not know where to buy them.
i have two dogs , one pitbull and old english bulldog.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy cooking ethnic foods and listening to Red Hot Chili Peppers.
I watched a lot of sports last year and kept my home clean and tidy.
i m learning to play the guitar.
I enjoy my bike rides with some tunes in my ears.
i speak fluent german.

content.text: Hey I'm new here. What's your name?
Hi there! My name is participant_2 and I live in [city].
Nice to meet you participant_1! I'm participant_1 and I'm from [city].
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking with my dogs. I also enjoy collecting comic books.
That's cool! I love to cook ethnic foods and listen to Red Hot Chili Peppers.
Oh I've never been hiking with my dogs but I've heard it's fun. I'll have to try it sometime. What kind of ethnic foods do you like to cook?
I like to cook a lot of different types of foods, but my favorite is probably Indian food.
Oh I love Indian food! I could eat it every day.
Me too! It's so flavorful and delicious.
What is your favorite Red Hot Chili Peppers song?
I'm not sure I could pick just one favorite song, but I really like "Under the Bridge" and "Can't Stop".
Those are both great songs! I love the guitar solo in "Under the Bridge".
Me too! It's so iconic.
What other hobbies do you have?
I also like to play guitar and bike ride. I'm learning German too.
That's awesome! I used to play guitar but I'm not very good. I love to bike ride too. I've never learned German but I've always wanted to.
It's never too late to learn a new language! I've been taking lessons for a few months and I'm really enjoying it.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be speaking German in no time.
Thanks! I hope so.
Well I'm glad to have met you participant_1. It sounds like we have a lot in common.
Me too! I'm glad I met you too participant_2.
Maybe we can hang out sometime and go hiking or something?
That would be great! I'd love to hang out with you.
Great! I'll send you a message later and we can figure out a time to meet up.
Sounds good! I'm looking forward to it
